package-manager.name: pkgadd
package-manager.title: GNU Compiler Collection
package-manager.description: The GNU Compiler Collection (GCC) provides a standard conforming and highly portable ISO C, ISO C++, Fortran 77, Java, and Ada compiler.

item.para: Forgot c++filt binary from binutils for some platforms
Add Ada binaries for Tru64 UNIX
Fix runtime library path for libstdc++, libobjc, and libf2c on AIX and HP-UX
Add Ada support for Tru64 UNIX 4.0D
Apply fix for PR11397 (weak aliases broken on Tru64 UNIX)
Apply fix for PR13150 (WEAK symbols not exported by collect2)
Apply fix for PR14113 (-O2 corrupts stack)
Apply fix for PR13354 (internal compiler error: in sparc_emit_set_const32)
Apply fix for PR12865 ("mprotect" call to make trampoline executable may fail)
Apply fix for PR12496 (wrong result for __atomic_add(&value, -1) when using -O0 -m64)
Apply fix for PR11634 (ICE in verify_local_live_at_start, at flow.c:555)
Apply fix for PR13031 (ICE (unrecognizable insn) when building gnome-libs-1.4.2)
Apply fix for PR12965 (SEGV+ICE in cc1plus on alpha-linux with -O2)
Apply fix for PR12654 (Incorrect comparison code generated for Alpha)
Apply fix for PR12441 (Can't spill register bug)
Apply fix for PR13608 (Incorrect code with -O3 -ffast-math)
